Paragraph: In addition , the charge separation efficiency in the current combination might not be as high as that in P3HT : PCBM , although it was difficult to estimate the internal quantum efficiency ( IQE ) accurately due to the light interference effect in the films.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In addition , the charge separation efficiency in the current combination might not be as high as that in P3HT : PCBM , although it was difficult to estimate the internal quantum efficiency ( IQE ) accurately due to the light interference effect in the films.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| charge separation efficiency |
| internal quantum efficiency (IQE) |
| light interference effect |

The three property names identified in the paragraph are "charge separation efficiency," "internal quantum efficiency (IQE)," and "light interference effect." These properties are all characteristics of the materials and processes being discussed in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| charge separation efficiency |
| internal quantum efficiency (IQE) |

After reviewing the entities identified in the previous answer, I have removed "light interference effect" as it is not a material property, but rather a phenomenon that can affect the measurement of material properties. The remaining two entities, "charge separation efficiency" and "internal quantum efficiency (IQE)," are both material properties that are relevant to the discussion in the paragraph.
